verses.verse: You see, I want you to realize that I have such a struggle concerning you and the people in Laodicea, and as many as have not seen my face in the physical body,

that their hearts might be encouraged after being pulled together in love and into all the wealth of the full accomplishment of the understanding, into a correct understanding of the secret of the God and Father and of the Anointed King,
in whom all the treasures of the insight and information are hidden away.
I say this so that no one may misguide you in a persuasive message.
You see, even if I am away from you in the physical body, still I am together with you in the Spirit being happy and seeing your arrangement and the solidness of your trust in the Anointed King.
So as you received the Anointed King Jesus in, the Master, traipse around in Him
having been rooted, being built on in Him, and being authenticated in the trust, just as you were taught, overflowing in it in thankfulness.

See that no one will be the one carrying you off as stolen property through the philosophy and meaningless fraud in line with the tradition of the people, in line with the conventional practices of the world, and not in line with the Anointed King,
because in Him resides all the fullness of the Godhead bodily.
And you are in Him, having been filled up, who is the head of every head ruler and authority,
in whom you also were circumcised with circumcision not made with hands, in the stripping away of the body of the sins of the physical body in the Anointed King's circumcision
when you were buried together with Him in the submersion, in which you also were gotten up together with Him through the trust of the influence of God, the One who got Him up from the dead.
And you being dead in the infractions and the uncircumcision of your physical body He brought to life together with Him when, in an act of generosity, He forgave you of all the infractions
after erasing the handwritten document against us in the rules, that was an undetected opponent to us. And He has taken it from the middle by nailing it to the cross.
After stripping away the head rulers and the authorities, He made an exhibit of them in an open way when He brought them out in a victory parade in it.
So no one must judge you in dining, or in drinking, or in a detail of a festival, or a new moon, or Sabbaths,
(that are a shadow of the things that are going to come, but the body is the Anointed King's).

No one must disqualify you from receiving your prize, wanting to be in a lowly focus and with a religion of the angels, intruding into things that he has not looked at, being conceited for no reason by the way of thinking of his physical body,
and not holding on to the head, from which the entire body through its connections and bonds, being further supplied and pulled together, grows the growth of God.
So if you died together with the Anointed King out of the conventional practices of the world, why do you consider rules as if you are people living in the world?
"You should not touch, nor should you taste, nor should you come into contact with it,"
that are all for deterioration with the full use in line with the regulations and instructions of the people,
some things that are a message that certainly has insight in invented religion, lowly focus, and not going easy on the body, not with any value toward a filling up of the physical body.
